name: Sound Pitch Recognition
short_description: A set of Qt/C++ classes enabling cross-platform sound recording and pitch recognition. Can be used in software (e.g. instrument tuners, sound dictation, music teaching and tests) as a user input method. Includes a guitar-tuner example.
